name: NeuroLeadership
description: In 2007, David and Lisa Rock and their team had been working in leadership development and executive coaching for ten years, when David coined the term “NeuroLeadership.” That same year, what would become the NeuroLeadership Institute ran its first Summit in Asolo, Italy, convening business practitioners and brain scientists. In its first few years, NLI published the foundational papers in the field, including the first paper on the SCARF ® Model.After two and a half years of research, NLI launched the SEEDS Model ® in 2015, and a diversity and inclusion (D&I) practice was born.

enhanced_description: NeuroLeadership, founded in 2007, is a pioneering organization in leadership development and executive coaching, leveraging neuroleadership principles grounded in brain science. It offers world-changing thought leadership, clear strategies, and frameworks to accelerate transformation through its Insights and Advisory services. The product suite includes proven habit activation initiatives to scale behavior change quickly, delivered through training eLearning software and a training management system. Key contributions to the field include the foundational SCARF® Model and the SEEDS Model® (launched in 2015), which also gave rise to its diversity and inclusion (D&I) practice.
